notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.S.M.-O., L.A.-M., W.N.d.O. and É.N.A. performed the experiments. S.S.M.-O., L.A.-M., W.N.d.O. and É.N.A. performed the literature search and drafted the manuscript. S.S.M.-O., L.B.F.C.d.S. and W.N.d.O. were responsible for the antifungal activity assay. K.C.Z. was responsible for the mucoadhesive assay. A.C.M., G.M.C. and E.S.T.E. contributed to the development of concept, data analysis, and revision of the manuscript.
